content: Namoto - TOM 1.0Namoto (TOM) is an open source peer-to-peer money system with no central governance that improves on the original Bitcoin protocol.Namoto allows users to send and receive decentralized transactions.Newest Version Releases v1.0.0.3Linux-x64 github/namoto31/namoto/releases/tag/v1.0.0.3/linuxWindows github/namoto31/namoto/releases/tag/v1.0.0.3/windowsLinksWebsite https://namoto.orgSlack join.slack.com/t/namoto/shared_invite/zt-1nnpuimcy-LIJ7s7wjfx_TLMDhGBSEmwDiscord discord.com/invite/wgUs4hXM5kTwitter twitter.com/NamotoTom/  New: Block ExplorerBlocks: https://openchains.info/coin/namoto/Richlist: https://openchains.info/coin/namoto/richlist   New: Exchange ListingsTOM-USDT: https://www.bitxonex.com/market/tomusdtTOM-LTC: https://www.bitxonex.com/market/tomltcTOM-USDT: https://xeggex.com/market/TOM_USDTTOM-BTC: https://xeggex.com/market/TOM_BTCMiningaddnode=64.190.113.181addnode=45.77.77.239addnode=149.28.51.213addnode=108.61.149.178addnode=45.77.153.55Source code https://github.com/namoto31/namotoUbuntu: namoto.tar.gz https://github.com/namoto31/namoto/releases/download/v1.0.0/namoto.tar.gzPoolshttps://spools.online/site/mininghttps://luckydogpool.com/site/mininghttps://latinminers.com/https://zergpool.com/site/block?coin=TOMhttps://zeusminingpool.com/https://coinxpool.com/https://mine2.altcoinbuilders.com/https://altcoinpool.ru/https://merged1.cminors-pool.com/Mining statshttps://miningpoolstats.stream/namotoNamoto specificationsTicker:    TOMMaximum coin supply:    31,000,000Consensus:    Proof of Work - ScryptInitial block reward:    16Block time:    6.3 minutesHalvening frequency:    1,000,000 blocksHalvening events:    Year: 2035, 2047, 2059, 2071Max block size:    2mbRPC port:    8420P2P port:    8421Coinbase maturity:    100 blocksDifficulty adjustment:    6,720 blocks (29.4 days)Transactions per second:    22Coinbase emmisions end:    Year 2083Source code publish date:    15/1/2023Genesis block mined:    16/1/2023

comments.author: maxtra
comments.body: What specific improvements does Namoto (TOM) bring to the Bitcoin protocol in terms of decentralization, governance, and transactions and how are these achieved?

comments.author: namotod
comments.body: Quote from: maxtra on January 23, 2023, 06:01:44 PMWhat specific improvements does Namoto (TOM) bring to the Bitcoin protocol in terms of decentralization, governance, and transactions and how are these achieved?Hi maxtra. Namoto has a fairer and longer coin distribution period than Bitcoin, which allows for more even distribution from the beginning. The coins distribution model aims to reduce the number of large whales from the early days of mining. Only 4% of the Namoto supply will be mined in the first year, as compared to 12.5% for bitcoin in year 1. The Namoto website (https://namoto.org/#charts) provides an interactive chart that shows how many coins will be mined in percentage terms over time, compared to bitcoin.The fairer distribution of coins from mining should help onload ample hashpower, independent miners and nodes over a long time into the future making Namoto decentralized.By seeking to attract numerous talented developers to become Github repository collaborators from day one, Namoto aims to secure fair development governance much like Bitcoin has.Transactions are improved with a bigger block size (2mb) and faster block times as compared to other cryptocurrencies on the market today - making it an attractive choice for users looking for speedier transaction confirmations to a degree.

comments.body: ====================================Hi,We've added Namoto(TOM) to http://pool.crionic.org See below for connection details.====================================Fee only: 0.5% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05,and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.====================================- Sample configurations -To mine and get paid in TOM:Code Shared Mining:Quote-a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://pool.crionic.org:5457 WALLET_ADDRESS -u -p c=TOMCode Solo Mining:Quote-a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://pool.crionic.org:5457-u WALLET_ADDRESS -p c=TOM,m=solo====================================Support: https://discord.gg/uH9337MRYg====================================

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: the usual dilemma of saying they improve the btc protocol is that they can't survive long in this market. so many projects have tried to surpass the tech of btc, and yet, they can't get even a quarter of the popularity of btc. well, anyone can introduce their project on this community. but the survival rate is very low especially to projects that have no solid foundation to continue long-term.
